gist.summary: Added a new /audio/models endpoint to the API proxy to list available audio generation models.
gist.impact: Developers can now programmatically discover available audio models and filter them based on API key permissions.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee in a cozy, retro music studio or record shop, browsing through a collection of cassette tapes or vinyl records. The collection represents the list of available audio models. The scene implies discovery and selection of sound.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit Pollinations bee browsing a collection of colorful cassette tapes in a tiny music studio. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'MODELS' on a shelf. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit Pollinations bee browsing a collection of colorful cassette tapes in a tiny music studio. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'MODELS' on a shelf. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
